Customer-focused global provider of freight forwarding and logistics.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1594392016601{margin-top: 50px !important;}”][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]Freight Forwarding comprises of vital coordinations arranging and execution for the universal development of products, for the benefit of shippers. In particular, a freight forwarder will complete freight rate exchanges, compartment following, customs documentation, and freight solidification, among different tasks. Imports and Exports make worthwhile open doors for organizations with the fortitude to execute vital coordinations plans. Be that as it may, the coordinations of worldwide delivery is complicated, without a doubt.

Why Choose Us?

  • Effective Management and Communication
  • Vast experience in freight forwarding
  • We have a Network of Partners and Agents
  • We Guarantee Carrier Compliance
  •  Efficient Logistics Services Selection

[/vc_column_text][vc_zigzag][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”1651″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1594393629047{margin-top: 50px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-6″][vc_single_image image=”1652″ img_size=”large”][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-6″ css=”.vc_custom_1569837473908{padding-left: 40px !important;}”]

 OUR FOCUS

To offer unrivaled support through clear, brief two-way correspondence. The objective is to assemble connections through our adaptability to meet our client’s evolving needs. We will appear through our experience and information on transportation that you are working with the absolute best.

[vc_zigzag][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” full_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1594395200604{margin-bottom: -50px !important;background: #e9e9e9 url(https://transglobeindia.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/25.jpg?id=1645) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1594395172026{margin-top: -50px !important;}”]

Benefits of using our freight forwarding services

* We have a  rapid transportation feature as we have multiple ways of transportation.

* Our packing services provide you 100% protection of your goods.

* We have a 24×7 communication system. We are always ready to help you out.

* We provide you the quality service as customer satisfaction is our primary motive.

* You don’t have to pay any other extra charges than the freight forwarding charges
